studyArms.name: LY3298176 5 mg
studyArms.description: Participants receive LY3298176 once weekly starting at 2.5 mg for 4 weeks, then titrated to a maintenance dose of 5 mg.

extensionAttributes.valueString: [{'dose': '2.5 mg/week', 'startDay': 1, 'endDay': 28, 'description': 'Initial dose escalation step'}, {'dose': '5 mg/week', 'startDay': 29, 'description': 'Maintenance dose'}]

studyArms.name: LY3298176 10 mg
studyArms.description: Participants receive LY3298176 once weekly starting at 2.5 mg, with dose increases of 2.5 mg every 4 weeks until 10 mg is reached.

extensionAttributes.valueString: [{'dose': '2.5 mg/week', 'startDay': 1, 'endDay': 28, 'description': 'Escalation step 1'}, {'dose': '5 mg/week', 'startDay': 29, 'endDay': 56, 'description': 'Escalation step 2'}, {'dose': '7.5 mg/week', 'startDay': 57, 'endDay': 84, 'description': 'Escalation step 3'}, {'dose': '10 mg/week', 'startDay': 85, 'description': 'Maintenance dose'}]

studyArms.name: LY3298176 15 mg
studyArms.description: Participants receive LY3298176 once weekly starting at 2.5 mg, with dose increases of 2.5 mg every 4 weeks until 15 mg is reached.

extensionAttributes.valueString: [{'dose': '2.5 mg/week', 'startDay': 1, 'endDay': 28, 'description': 'Escalation step 1'}, {'dose': '5 mg/week', 'startDay': 29, 'endDay': 56, 'description': 'Escalation step 2'}, {'dose': '7.5 mg/week', 'startDay': 57, 'endDay': 84, 'description': 'Escalation step 3'}, {'dose': '10 mg/week', 'startDay': 85, 'endDay': 112, 'description': 'Escalation step 4'}, {'dose': '12.5-15 mg/week', 'startDay': 113, 'description': 'Maintenance dose'}]

studyArms.name: Insulin Glargine
studyArms.description: Starting dose of 10 IU/day at bedtime, titrated to a fasting blood glucose <100 mg/dL following a treat-to-target algorithm.

epochs.name: Study Period I: Screening Lead-in
epochs.description: Establish eligibility and baseline HbA1c; includes dilated fundoscopic exam.

epochs.description: Primary efficacy period including dose escalation and maintenance.

epochs.name: Study Period III: Variable Treatment Period
epochs.description: Extended treatment until CV event and duration criteria are met.
